result.execSummary:
The defendant Richard Donald Rucks was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 3rd Degree Sexual Assault, a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

$268.00 PAID from bond.
$250.00 PAID from bond.

Must register with Sex Offender Registry for 15 years.
Must complete Sex Offender Treatment, submit to DNA testing.  Results to victim.
  Any other assessment/treatment/counseling deemed necessary.

supervisions.notes: Not eligible for Challenge or Substance Abuse programs.
